projects.title: Arena of Champions
projects.bodyText:
- An Upcoming Arena Fighting Game!
- Battle an AI until you can't
- Upgrade your Champion using XP gained from enemies

projects.title: Invoice Tracking App
projects.bodyText:
- Invoice Tracking App made in Android Studio using **Java**
- Used **Room** Databases to store user inputted data
- Designed a simple, interactive and accurate UI

projects.title: Car Parts Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A Car Part Tracker/Manager web app made using **Node, Handlebars and PostGresSQL Database** 
- People can create a new car part and create projects
 - Implemented User loging and regisitration
 - Temporarily Deployed on **heroku** (changing soon)

projects.title: Budgeting App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that allows users to send texts in real time
 - End to End encryption using **RSA** Algorithm.
 - Uses **Firebase** database to store texts.
 - Secured with **Fingerprint** lock.

projects.title: Inventory Tracker App
projects.bodyText:
- A Desktop App created in **WPF** for grocery stores to keep track of products 
 - Save and Load inventory items locally to a .CSV file
 - Very basic user interface

projects.title: MVVM Sample App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads data from mock API and show in both **LinearLayout** and **GridLayout RecyclerView**.
 - Offline support using **Room** DB and **NetworkBoundResource**.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.

projects.title: Feed List App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads list of feeds from a **paginated** API and shows in a RecyclerView.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.
 - Uses **Paging 3** library along with other Architecture Components.

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **Angular 12**.
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.

projects.title: Image Encryption/Decryption
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App for Image Encryption and Decryption made in **Django**.
 - Uses **SDES** algorithm for encryption/decryption.
